page.title: 11WORTHEN SHOPPING PATTERNS
page.content:
In a survey of where people do their main "everyday" food and necessity shopping ,the results were
Shopping in Shrewsbury 24 families " " Welshpool 2 families " " Telford 1 family " " Churchstoke 7 families " " Pontesbury 1 family " " Worthen 1 family
Some families shop only once a month and store in cupboard and in deep freeze,most shop once a week. Those families who use Churchstoke shop on a Sunday,at the "Sunday Market" (Sunday shopping not permitted in Shropshire).Churchstoke is in Powys, Wales.
